resume_text:
NAME: Bob Johnson
EMAIL: bob.johnson@email.com
PHONE: (555) 987-6543

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with 8 years of expertise in automating infrastructure and deployment processes. Proven ability to build and maintain reliable and scalable systems.

SKILLS:
AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Jenkins, Ansible, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions Ltd. - DevOps Engineer (2018 - Present)
- Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform and Ansible.
- Managed and scaled Kubernetes clusters on AWS.

Web Services Corp. - System Administrator (2016 - 2018)
- Maintained Linux servers and network infrastructure.
- Implemented monitoring and alerting systems.

EDUCATION:
Stanford University - Master's in Computer Engineering (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
